WorkItem.ClosedComment: User misconception, set bonuses are being counted
WorkItem.Description: If I de-equip my 4th T9 piece, my listed Crit does not change by the 5% it should from the bonus T9 4 piece gives. At this point im not even sure the T9 2 piece bonus is calculated either.

Comments.Message: 4T9 crit will only be visible on individual spells affected. To check whether the set bonuses are active you can look on the Buffs tab.
Ok but what about T9 2 piece bonus? It makes Spirit considerably more useful to mages. Is this taken into account?
Yes, you should see an increase in crit rating when using molten armor.
My crit does not change by any amount when I enable Molten Armor.

Also when I hover over other set bonuses, the popup displays what that bonus does, like 18 spell power or 25 stamina. When I hover over the Khadgar's Regalia it just says "1 Khadgar's Regalia 2 Piece Bonus". Again I dont think the bonuses are being calculated
I don't think you're really enabling Molten Armor. It's probably enabled all the time. Go to options and disable automatic armor.

Kavan has already stated how you can tell that the values are being calculated:

Go to the 'Buffs > All Buffs' Comparison chart and find the set bonuses in the list and see their values. They should be green highlighted if you have 2/4 pieces equipped.

Yes they are highlighted under Buffs -> All Buffs. What im saying is that when I de-equip my 4th T9 piece I do NOT lose 5% crit like im supposed to which may indicate that contrary to what is shown under All Buffs the T9 bonuses are not being calculated.

And that's what we are telling you: If they weren't being calculated, those listings would be 0.0 DPS. And the Main Crit listing isn't going to change with that set bonus, Kavan explained that it will only be shown on the abilities it affects.

a) Since the T9 4P bonus is character wide and not affecting a specific ability or two, is there any reason why it wouldnt appear under the main crit listing?

b) Since the T9 2P bonus makes Spirit noticeably more useful (I gained 4% crit when I equipped my 2nd piece), is this effect on spirit taken into consideration when evaluating gear containing the Spirit stat?

a) 4T9 only affects Fireball, Frostbolt, Frostfire Bolt, Arcane Missiles, and Arcane Blast.

b) Yes.
Erm yes, my bad. Thanks for the clarifications
